ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary: As a sinister shadow envelopes our Salem Heroes, Tarot, Raven Hex, and then Skeleton Man find themselves under the Spell of an old enemy. An arena of warring Witches, a deadly affliction and a new cemetery guardian, reveal themselves in this first chapter entitled, "The Gathering".
ComicInfo.Title: The Shadow Witch - pt. 1 of 4
ComicInfo.StoryArc: "Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose" The Shadow Witch
ComicInfo.Characters: Tarot,Skeleton Man,Guardian of the Graves,Raven Hex,Tarot's Mother,Dragon Witch,Crypt Chick,Azure
ComicInfo.Teams: Skyclad Coven,Fluffy Witch Coven,Black Rose Coven
